title: How to Moisturize Your Lips Before Bed

steps.headline: Clean your lips.
steps.description: This is important to get off any lipstick or lip gloss. Wet a washcloth with warm water, and use cleanser or makeup remover if needed.

steps.headline: Exfoliate your lips.
steps.description: Exfoliating is very important. It removes dead skin, leaving your lips soft. You can use a store bought lip scrub, or make a homemade lip scrub. You can scrub with your fingers, a toothbrush, or a washcloth. Then rinse off with warm water.

steps.headline: Apply a moisturizing lip balm.
steps.description: You should apply a thick one for deep moisturization, it will sink in overnight. Make sure to cover your lips entirely, especially the corners; they get very dry. When you wake up your lips will be smooth and supple.
